snippet: Serena Williams won the French Open by topping the defending champion Maria Sharapova. At 31, she has won 16 Grand Slam singles events, and appears nowhere near finished.
abstract: Serena Williams defeats defending champion Maria Sharapova, 6-4, 6-4, to win women's final at French Open, Williams's 16th Grand Slam singles title.
lead_paragraph: Serena Williams won the French Open by topping the defending champion Maria Sharapova. At 31, she has won 16 Grand Slam singles events, and appears nowhere near finished.

headline.seo: Williams Defeats Sharapova to Win French Open
headline.main: Williams Rejoices, in French, After Winning 16th Grand Slam
headline.print_headline: Williams Rejoices, in French, After Winning 16th Grand Slam Title
